document_name: Project Document- Strengthening Thailand's Capacity to Link Climate Policy and Public Finance
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/THA/Prodoc_Strengthening Thailand's Capacity to Link Climate Change Policy and Public Finance.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Office on Natural Resources and Environmental Policy and Planning (ONEP) and UNDP have jointly work in a three-year project: "Strengthening Thailand's Capacity to link Climate Policy and  Public Finance" (2013-2015) with financial support by UNDP and Swedish International Development Agency (SIDA). The project is in cooperation with Fiscal Policy Office, Bureau of Budget, National Economic and Social Development Board and other related agencies. The main purpose is to strengthen Thailand's capacity to link climate policy and public finance/ and develop an efficient and effective monitoring and evaluation framework

project_descr: Strengthening Thailand's Capacity to Link Climate Policy and Public Finance
project_title: Strengthening Thailand's Capacity to Link Climate Policy
